concept.title: Basics
concept.shortdesc: After you log in, you can exchange text chats with your chat partners and more.

conbody.p: To start many basic tasks, just click the menu at the top â€“ Contacts, Meetings, Settings, and Log Out. The specific options you see for each menu depend upon the capabilities that are available in your organization.
To start tasks for a specific contact or group, right-click the contact or group name to display a list of options. Again, the specific options you see might vary.
